Html:
Do I need VS2010 to register the Prism binaries?

If yes, this would mean that I have to install VS2010 on Designer machines when they are using Blend.

If no, how can I do it?

This is important because Designer should not have to install VS2010 to be able to work with Regions in XAML files.
they should only have .NET4 / Silverlight 4 installed to my knowledge.
